public class HtmlException
extends Exception
Signals that an error condition has occured.

HtmlException()
Constructs an HtmlExcpetion with no detail error message.
HtmlException(String)
Constructs an HtmlException with the specified error message.

HtmlException 
  public HtmlException()
Constructs an HtmlExcpetion with no detail error message.
HtmlException 
  public HtmlException(String s)
Constructs an HtmlException with the specified error message.
Parameters:
msg - the error message
